/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The highway is teeming with vehicles, including cars and buses, all moving in harmony with the rhythm of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. On either side of the highway, buildings rise up, their windows reflecting the sunlight. Trees line the road, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the details of the cityscape.
